original_text: Next, Zabbai's son, Baruch, worked hard on another part of the wall. He started from the corner of the wall and went as far as the door of Eliashib's house. Eliashib was the leader of the priests.
korean_text: 그 다음은 삽배의 아들 바룩이 한 부분을 힘써 중수하여 성 굽이에서부터 대제사장 엘리아십의 집 문에 이르렀고

sentences.original_text: Next, Zabbai's son, Baruch, worked hard
sentences.korean_translation: 다음에, 사배의 아들 바룩이 열심히 일했습니다

sentences.original_text: on another part of the wall
He started from the corner of the wall
and went as far as the door of Eliashib's house
Eliashib was the leader of the priests
